data.md:MetaData: Iron carbonate concentration of sediment cores 9R and 10R at site PS104_20-2
PIT-3: Southern Pine Island Trough (north of basement-sedimentary strata boundary, area of dipping reflectors near seafloor surface, same site as GC PS104/20-1, near site PIT-06)
Diverse temperate rainforests near the South Pole during peak Cretaceous greenhouse warmth
